Page Contents

    Getting Started with Brightcove Video Connect for Adobe Experience Manager

    This topic provides an overview of Brightcove Video Connect for Adobe Experience Manager.
    Note: Support for AEM v6.2 will End as of January 1, 2021
    Plug-in Version Documentation Download Compatibility Notes
    5.6
    • Overview
    • Installation
    • Configuration
    • Using the Connector
    		 Plugin with Source
    • Supports AEM 6.5.x only
    • Major revamp of AEM Authoring
    • Updated Brightcove landing page for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove component library for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove components to include in-place editing and asset drag and drop functionalities
    • Implementing latest OSGi annotations and model classes where required
    • Ability to sync, manage folders
    • Major improvements to Metadata editing and management
    • Ability to create, manage and delete playlists
    • Support for iFrame embeds
    • Support for In-Page Experiences (IPX)
    5.5.4
    • Overview
    • Installation
    • Configuration
    • Using the Connector
    		 Plugin with Source
    • Supports AEM 6.5, 6.4, 6.3 and 6.2 (v5.6 for AEM 6.5 recommended!)
    • Removes hardcoded ingest profile if no value selected in the AEM OSGi config
    • Embeds Brightcove HTML5 Player
    • Supports Classic UI and Touch UI
    • Uses AEM asset manager
    • Added UTF-8 multi-language support
    • Extended Proxy support for S3 video upload
    5.5.0 EOL EOL End of Life as of January 1, 2020
    4.2.0 EOL EOL End of Life as of December 31, 2017
    4.1.2 EOL EOL End of Life as of December 31, 2017

    For help with this connector, please fill out this worksheet and include it with a support ticket to Brightcove customer support.
